sentences: Kang Dong-chul (Korean: 강동철, born June 17, 1979), also known by his stage name Brave Brothers, is a South Korean rapper, record producer and songwriter for Brave Entertainment.
He was a producer and composer for YG Entertainment from 2004 to 2008.
In 2008, he started his own record label called Brave Entertainment.
In 2009, he made his music debut with Attitude and later released Passionate on December 8.
Kang was a judge panelist on JTBC's Made In U program in 2011.
